articles.description: Japan's Deputy Chief Cabinet Secretary Manabu Sakai said there was 'absolutely no truth' in the report on Friday and said work is underway to establish countermeasures to Covid-19 in time.
articles.content:
Lord Coe has revealed Tokyo 2020 organisers now accept holding the Games behind closed doors after a day of denials over claims this summers event will be cancelled.
International Olympic Committee … [+8724 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Matthews
articles.title: Arsenal sign Mat Ryan on loan until the end of the season from Brighton - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Gunners allowed Matt Macey to join Hibernian earlier in the window and manager Mikel Arteta has been in the market for competition for Bernd Leno following a difficult start for Alex Runarsson.
articles.content:
Arsenal have signed Brighton goalkeeper Mat Ryan on loan until the end of the season.
